Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at WorldMark South Pacific Club by Wyndham Golden Beach in Golden Beach, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Bulcock Beach and Caloundra Events Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Kings Beach and Pelican Waters Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 125 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of WorldMark South Pacific Club by Wyndham Golden Beach. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of WorldMark South Pacific Club by Wyndham Golden Beach. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at WorldMark South Pacific Club by Wyndham Golden Beach in Golden Beach, you'll be near the beach and convenient to Bulcock Beach and Caloundra Events Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Kings Beach and Pelican Waters Golf Club.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bulcock Beach - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Caloundra Events Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Kings Beach - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Pelican Waters Golf Club - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Shelly Beach - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Moffat Beach - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Dickey Beach - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Aussie World - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Kawana Beach - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 15.3 km / 9.5 mi
Landsborough Museum - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Australia Zoo - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi
Big Pineapple - 20.9 km / 13 mi

The preferred airport for WorldMark South Pacific Club by Wyndham Golden Beach is Brisbane, QLD (BNE) - 62.8 km / 39 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
